DOC.brief_summary: Adults with Crohn's disease that is clinically active despite conventional treatment will be eligible for this study. Patients may receive one of three doses of PF-00547659 (experimental drug) or placebo (inactive drug). Disease activity will be measured every two weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Study To Test Whether PF-00547659 Is Safe And Improves Disease Symptoms In Patients With Crohn's Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects must have failed or are intolerant to antiTNFs and/or immunosuppressants (AZA, 6MP, and/or MTX). hsCRP greater than 3mg/L Ulcerations demonstrated by colonoscopy performed during screening or 8 weeks prior to screening Pregnant or breast feeding Short bowel syndrome due to multiple small bowel resections Presence of a stoma
DOC.keyword: Crohn's disease Safety Efficacy Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Crohn's Disease Activity Index (CDAI)
